items.content_html: A lightweight reactive wrapper around EventSource using RxJS, providing automatic reconnection with backoff and jitter.
items.title: andreasnicolaou/reactive-event-source: A lightweight reactive wrapper around EventSource using RxJS, providing automatic reconnection with backoff and jitter.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: A mini Job‑Application Tracker (similar to a lightweight Trello board) where an authenticated user can add job opportunities and move each card through pipeline stages (Applied → Interview → Offer → Hired / Rejected) in real time.

items.content_html: A simple alternative to the mv command, designed to handle file renaming when a file with the target name already exists. move automatically adds an index or number to the file name to prevent conflicts. Lightweight and dependency-free.

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
items.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: NodeExpressDate is a lightweight Node.js application built with Express and body-parser that processes HTTP requests based on dynamic Date and time conditions. It demonstrates conditional routing using JavaScript’s Date object and if/else logic, making it a practical example for learning date-based API responses in a Node.js environment.
items.title: vdharmendra/NodeExpressDate-Template: NodeExpressDate is a lightweight Node.js application built with Express and body-parser that processes HTTP requests based on dynamic Date and time conditions. It demonstrates conditional routing using JavaScript’s Date object and if/else logic, making it a practical example for learning date-based API responses in a Node.js environment.

items.content_html: Showcasing a lightweight and high-performance frontend framework built entirely with pure TypeScript! Featuring a custom Virtual DOM implementation and a set of reactive hooks, it delivers a React-like development experience—without any external frameworks or libraries, just clean and modular TypeScript code!
items.title: ayoub-essarghini/RobotoJs: Showcasing a lightweight and high-performance frontend framework built entirely with pure TypeScript! Featuring a custom Virtual DOM implementation and a set of reactive hooks, it delivers a React-like development experience—without any external frameworks or libraries, just clean and modular TypeScript code!

items.content_html: A lightweight tool that takes your LinkedIn profile link, resume link, or PDF file, and automatically generates a stylish README.md for your GitHub main profile. It includes your bio, key info, favorite quote, and a personalized theme — all previewed live before saving!
items.title: ishikajais27/GitFolio: A lightweight tool that takes your LinkedIn profile link, resume link, or PDF file, and automatically generates a stylish README.md for your GitHub main profile. It includes your bio, key info, favorite quote, and a personalized theme — all previewed live before saving!
